attributes.action: The Matter of Human Rights and British Nationality  From Me
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MY PETITION ONLY HAVING FOLLOWING DETAILS
BOTH AT ME WITH MY LATE FATHER IN WHICH FULLY LISTED IN BELOWS ARE:
1-UK OR GB FCO REF:BCN/13264/19179 BY MR.I.A.BARRAS.
2-UK OR GB HOME OFFICE REF:C-323151 BY MR.JACK STRAW.
3-UK OR GB UKPA REF:UKP/3438/1990 BOTH BY MR.JOHN MAJOR AND MR.JACK STRAW.
4-UK OR GB HOME OFFICE AND FCO BOTH UNDER ONLY ON FILE ARE CM 15290 BY MS.BUTTERWORTH AND MRS.SARAH V.TAYLOR SINCE 1979 UP TO 2005 OFTEN REFUSED OR REJECTED SO MANY TIMES OR DATES BOTH TO ME AND MY LATE FATHER WHO IS CHAN SUEN WENG UP TO THIS NEW YEAR ARE 2010 STILL UNABLE TO SOLVED YET ONLY FOR OR JUST ON MY MATTER OR CASE ONLY???????
YOUR SINCERELY,
CHAN YIU BING FRDRK.
DATED AT:10TH,FEB,2010.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
